This exceptional item holds immense value to us at $1,000,000, reflecting its unique features and unparalleled quality. We believe this is a fair and advantageous proposition, allowing us to recoup a substantial portion of its value while providing you with a remarkable asset. Should you choose to accept this offer, we assure you of a seamless transaction and exceptional customer service throughout the process. If you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working together. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $950,000.

(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $950,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,000,000
